meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Greg Johnson Liz Fritz Jon Rossiter Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7186.

td.p: Greg Johnson, a software engineer from Marietta, Georgia
Liz Fritz, an intake coordinator from Spring Hill, Kansas
Jon Rossiter, a college geography instructor from San Diego, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,600)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', '(Jimmy of the Clue Crew reports from the Brookfield Zoo in Chicago.) div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
GregWhat is the Freedom of Information Act?
$3,900
JonWhat is the Eminent Domain Act?
$3,900
LizWhat is the Freedom of Information Act? Hi Christina + Jessica
$4,401
the Freedom of Information Act')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'The website for this \'60s act says, "First look to see if the information you are interested in is already publicly available"')

tr.td: The website for this '60s act says, "First look to see if the information you are interested in is already publicly available"

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
